name: Slitherz (ZenCoder, DevilsWork.shop)
description:
Navin Nair

Aka ZenCoder (http://www.zen-coder.com/) is a professional game programmer and has worked in a bunch of startups helping them get off the ground. His passion for indie games and game development has driven him to explore AI, networking, core game-play systems and tools for a bunch of indie projects.

Ajay Karat

Designer, animator and avid indie gamer. The creator of http://www.devilsgarage.com and a itch.io community developer
